blobby - package blobby
Main package of application
blobby.controller - package blobby.controller
Package containing files related to controller
blobby.game - package blobby.game
All logical elements of the model

Parts of the view related to showing graphics
blobby.input - package blobby.input
Classes related to keyboard and AI input
blobby.objects - package blobby.objects
All physical elements of the model
blobby.utils - package blobby.utils
Utilities used by the game, but not directly related to it

BOTTOM_RADIUS - Static variable in class blobby.objects.Blob
Radius of bottom circle
